detailsSection:
Objectives
By the end of this training, you will be able to: 
• Understand the context of the Field Service mobile app within Field Service and the Power Platform
• Install and log into the mobile app and interact with Field Service information like bookings and work orders.
• Perform common configurations like editing the tables, forms, views, and columns displayed in the mobile app and set up ‘offline first’ so the mobile app works without internet access.
• Perform more advanced configurations and customizations to accommodate more business requirements and processes.
• Learn best practices to implement the Field Service mobile app including migrating from the previous mobile app.
Structure
1. Prerequisites: Installation and setup (60 min)
o Create a new environment or use your own.
o Add Field Service to an existing environment (if applicable).
o Open your Field Service environment
o Create a new user to represent a frontline worker
o Complete the getting started page to create a frontline worker and schedule a work order to view on the mobile app
2. Introduction to configurations and customizations (60 min)
o Edit the Site Map
o Edit a mobile view
o Add a field to the mobile Booking form
o Add a field to the mobile Work Order form
o Enable offline first and modify the offline profile
3. Advanced capabilities and customizations (120 min)
o Frontline worker address and location tracking
o Push notifications
o Enable barcode scanning
o Run mobile workflows, processes, JavaScript
4. Implementation guidance (30 min)
o Mobile adoption playbook
o Best practices
o Documentation

installInstructionSection: Simply download the PDF and follow the instructions.
